item.description:
Between football, leaf-peeping and apple-picking, come join us for some writing exercises to keep the brain moving after summer's insanity. It's getting colder out, so this is the perfect time to start up some of those projects you've been putting off while you've been at the beach...

As always, if you have any ideas for exercises please bring them!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the upstairs cafe seating, toward the back.
item.name: Fall for Writing Exercises! (Lamest Meetup Name EVER)
